name: Monty Mole and the Temple of Lost Souls
overview: After the fiasco at the Honey Shop, Monty needed a rest. He had always wanted to visit the Pyramids...so off he flew. After hours of looking at sand...and rocks...and more rocks...and, oh look a scorpion...Monty got fed up with the Tour Guide and so, completely ignoring the no entry signs he slipped through a interestingly old looking door, which Unfortunately slammed shut behind him. Before him rose the Pyramid in all its glory...."I wonder whats inside it" he thought out loud, "Only one way to find", and so off he went, not knowing the dangers and delights that lay in store. Guide Monty in his quest to plunder the treasure and escape from the Temple of Lost Souls..Collect ancient artefacts and gemstones to open up hidden areas avoiding the traps and deadly inhabitants along the way. Get rich and get out...or stay forever trapped as one of those poor lost souls.
